code:
%%{init: {'theme': 'base', 'themeVariables': { 'primaryColor': '#ffffff', 'primaryTextColor': '#000000', 'primaryBorderColor': '#000000', 'lineColor': '#000000'}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> IDLE

    IDLE --> VALIDATING: swap_expert()

    VALIDATING --> PREPARING: validation passed
    VALIDATING --> FAILED: validation failed

    PREPARING --> EXECUTING: checkpoint created
    PREPARING --> FAILED: load failed

    EXECUTING --> COMMITTING: atomic swap done
    EXECUTING --> ROLLING_BACK: swap failed

    COMMITTING --> IDLE: cleanup done

    FAILED --> ROLLING_BACK: auto-rollback

    ROLLING_BACK --> IDLE: restored

    note right of VALIDATING
        Check:
        • Architecture match
        • Tensor shapes
        • Data types
    end note

    note right of PREPARING
        Actions:
        • Load new weights
        • Create checkpoint
        • Allocate memory
    end note

    note right of EXECUTING
        ACID Atomic:
        • Lock acquired
        • Pointer swap
        • Lock released
    end note
